import React, { Component } from 'react'; class LunchroomModalComponent extends Component { menu={ id_menu:1, id_lunchroom:"asdnkjh13u4982u3", date:"20/10/18", soup:"changua", appetizer:"lenteja", main_course:"arroz", protein:"pollo", juice:"maracuya", dessert:"piazza", salad:"ensalada de frutas" } info={ price:5000, line:20, time:10 } constructor( props ){ super( props ); this.state = { currentTime:this.info.time } } redMin(){ this.setState(( prevState, props ) => ({ currentTime: prevState.currentTime - 1 })); } componentDidMount(){ } render() { return (

{this.props.name}

Menú

Sopa: {this.menu.soup}
Principio: {this.menu.appetizer}
Seco: {this.menu.main_course}
Proteina: {this.menu.protein}
Jugo: {this.menu.juice}
Postre: {this.menu.dessert}
Ensalada: {this.menu.salad}

Información

Precio: {this.info.price} pesos
Turnos restantes: {this.info.line}
Tiempo de espera: {this.info.time} minutos
); } } export default LunchroomModalComponent;
